document.heading: Public Transit Escalator and Elevator Safety Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-171, the “Public Transit Escalator and Elevator Safety Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-649, which was referred to the Committee on Regional Authorities. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 2, 1992, and July 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 23, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-269 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-171 became effective on October 1, 1992.
